snippet.title: Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair UK Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair is OUT NOW for PS4! Earth Defense Force 2: Invaders From Planet Space for PSVita is also OUT NOW!

Get yours today! 
Get an EDF TShirt with the game from Rice Digital: http://bit.ly/1QbKYUJ
Amazon: http://amzn.to/1QbI0jb 
GAME: http://bit.ly/1o5QICH
